subject: p15131736
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Moderate pulmonary edema with small bilateral pleural effusions and areas of atelectasis at the lung bases. Moderate-to-severe cardiomegaly. Overall, low lung volumes. No newly appeared parenchymal opacities. No pneumothorax.
